member.name: T:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error
member.summary: The data model for represent error.

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Code
member.summary: Error code. .

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Col
member.summary: Column number (starting from 0).

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Len
member.summary: Length of the misspelled word.

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Pos
member.summary: Position of the misspelled word (counting from 0).

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Row
member.summary: Line number (counting from 0).

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Steer
member.summary: Tip (may be several or may not be available).

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Error.Word
member.summary: The original word.

member.name: T:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error codes. .

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.ErrorCode.ErrorUnknownWord
member.summary: There is no word in the dictionary.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.ErrorCode.ErrorRepeatWord
member.summary: Repeating words.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.ErrorCode.ErrorCapitalization
member.summary: Incorrect use of uppercase and lowercase letters.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.ErrorCode.ErrorTooManyErrors
member.summary: The text contains too many errors. In this case, the application can send text Yandex.Speller remain untested in the following query.

member.summary: Supported languages.

member.summary: Russian

member.summary: Ukrainian

member.summary: English

member.name: T:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options
member.summary: Settings Yandex.Speller .

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.Default
member.summary: No specific options.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.IgnoreUppercase
member.summary: Ignore words written in capital letters, such as "VPK".

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.IgnoreDigits
member.summary: Ignore words with numbers, such as "avp17h4534."

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.IgnoreUrls
member.summary: Ignore Internet addresses, email addresses and filenames.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.FindRepeatWords
member.summary: Highlight repetitions of words, consecutive. For example, "I flew to Cyprus."

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.IgnoreLatin
member.summary: Ignore words, written in Latin, for example, "madrid".

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.NoSuggest
member.summary: Just check the text, without giving options for replacement.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.FlagLatin
member.summary: Flag words, written in Latin, as errors.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.ByWords
member.summary: Do not use a dictionary environment (context) during the scan. This is useful in cases where the service is transmitted to the input of a list of individual words.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.IgnoreCapitalization
member.summary: Ignore the incorrect use of uppercase / lowercase letters, for example, in the word "moscow".

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.Options.IgnoreRomanNumerals
member.summary: Ignore Roman numerals ("I, II, III, ...").

member.name: P:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.SpellResult.Errors
member.summary: Found errors.

member.name: T:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.TextFormat
member.summary: Checked text format.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.TextFormat.Plain
member.summary: Text without markup.

member.name: F:Yandex.Speller.Api.DataContract.TextFormat.Html
member.summary: HTML-Text.
